name: react-repka
description: A Reactjs boilerplate for my personal workflow

scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] src/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.release: browserify -t [ babelify ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] src/index.js -o build/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -v -t [ babelify ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] src/index.js -o build/bundle.js

author: Mark Repka
